item.title: 1.0.0-beta.4
item.description:
1.0.0-beta.4: Precision & Control

New Features:

  • Double-Click to Reveal: You can now double-click the Thaw icon to instantly reveal your "always-hidden" menu bar section.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Smarter Temporary Items: Temporarily shown icons now rehide immediately when you switch applications, in addition to the standard timer.
  • macOS 14/15 Stability: Fixed an issue where rehiding items could accidentally trigger the Apple menu.
  • Icon Placement: Improved logic to prevent "jiggling" and placement errors on older macOS versions when the control item is at the far left.
  • Search Cleanup: The search field now automatically clears itself whenever you close the search panel.
  • Reliable Migration: Enhanced the Ice settings detection logic to ensure the importer only appears when valid data is found.
  • UI Refinement: Cleaned up copyright strings and optimized how items return to their original sections after being temporarily visible.

item.title: 1.0.0-beta.3
item.description:
1.0.0-beta.3: Polishing the Interface

New Features:

  • Sparkle Consent: Added a new in-app consent sheet for updates, giving you more control over how and when Thaw checks for new versions.
  • Display Management: Thaw now automatically refreshes its state and restarts when you connect a new monitor to ensure everything stays aligned.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Menu Bar Reliability: Improved the "rehide" logic with a retry mechanism to ensure temporary items don't get stranded in the visible section.
  • Appearance Editor: Restored the editor as a top-anchored popover that automatically resizes when menu bar shapes are enabled and focuses immediately upon opening.
  • Notched Displays: Fixed a layout issue on secondary notched screens to prevent false "not enough room" alerts.
  • Icon Stability: Resolved an issue where icons could appear duplicated in the menu bar and ensured the "Ice Cube" remains the default icon.
  • Performance: Optimized the icon cache to refresh immediately after rapid clicks and added a background check to keep newly inserted macOS icons visible.
  • Clean Up: Successfully removed the final remaining branding references from the user interface and improved the reliability of importing old hotkey settings.

item.title: 1.0.0-beta.2
item.description:
1.0.0-beta.2: Aesthetic & Stability Update

New Features:

  • Ice Migration: You can now import your old Ice settings, including your custom control item positions.
  • New Branding: Full transition to the "Thaw" aesthetic, featuring a brand-new app icon.
  • Better Shortcuts: Added Command + , to quickly open settings directly from the search window.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Smarter Hiding: Enhanced the "Smart Rehide" strategy with better focus monitoring and auto-hiding menu bar support.
  • Reliability: Improved menu open detection to ensure the menu bar behaves predictably.
  • Cursor Fix: Resolved an issue where the cursor could occasionally stay hidden due to tracking errors.
